name: Physics Sandbox - V0.1A
description:
Physics Sandbox V0.1a.

This is a physics simulation prototype game designed to have fun and blow stuff up,      like i say on every game this is a PROTOTYPE so please don't judge to hard on how this game is not as finished as others. This is one of my first games so please leave feedback to improve this concept.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move Camera:    WASD  or Right Click+Mouse

Change Object  / Tool:    Scroll Wheel

Zoom Out:    Shift+Scroll Wheel

Quit Game:    Escape

--------------------------------------------------------------------

That's everything, please enjoy and leave feedback.
